title: 179.257 APPLICABILITY.
text: The provisions of sections 179.254 to 179.256 requiring the transfer of payments between benefit funds shall apply only to those benefit funds which are established, located and maintained within this state. However nothing contained herein shall be construed to discourage the legislature of another state or to prohibit the trustees of a benefit fund which is located in another state from providing, in accordance with sections 179.254 to 179.257 and on a wholly reciprocal basis, transfers between such foreign benefit fund or funds and a benefit fund located within the state of Minnesota.
